string.name: whats_new_text
string.translation_description: Description of new features in this version in html

resources.string:
Welcome %1$s

New in version %2$s

\t • Make the calibration dialogs less frequent
\t • Chinese translation fix
\t • Added Epsilon Lyrae (by request)
\t • New: no need to accept EULA with each update from now on
\t • Minor stability fixes
